title: ChromaSpec: Professional Color Palette Analysis Tool
description: A Python CLI tool for extracting and analyzing color palettes from images and SVG files. ChromaSpec generates professional PDF reports with Swiss typographic design, featuring HEX/RGB/CMYK color values, frequency statistics, color harmonies (complementary, analogous), WCAG accessibility ratings, and enterprise-grade security validations. Ideal for designers, developers, and accessibility professionals.
